title.zh: 武汉：华中科技大学同济医学院暑期学校
title.en: Wuhan: HUST Tongji Medical College Summer School

description.zh: 血友姐妹会成员参与华中科技大学同济医学院的暑期学校（2025 Tongji Summer School）课程。左钰洁和何洋帆参与「遗传和分子流行病学（一）、（二）」课程，姚婷耀参与科学写作（Scientific Writing）课程。这次学习进一步提升了团队成员在遗传学、流行病学和科学写作方面的专业能力。
description.en: Members of the Hemophilia Sisters team participated in the 2025 Tongji Summer School courses at Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo and He Yangfan participated in 'Genetic and Molecular Epidemiology (1) & (2)' courses, while Yao Tingyao participated in the Scientific Writing course. This learning experience further enhanced team members' professional capabilities in genetics, epidemiology, and scientific writing.
